```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
# libraries in Tidyverse
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r code-chunk-label}
groceries <- 
  read.csv(url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HwanKim2/data_repo/main/Groceries_dataset.csv"))
glimpse(groceries)
```

```{r}
item_count <- groceries %>%
  dplyr::count(itemDescription) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
item_count[1:10,]
ggplot(item_count[1:10,], 
       aes(x=reorder(itemDescription, -n), y = n)) +
geom_bar(stat="identity") +
labs(x = "", y = "quantity sold") +
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))
```
